channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WY

item.title: Report I-2023030014
item.description:
Report I-2023030014

Identified by scraper @ 2023-04-03T15:59:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-02-04
  • City: CENTENNIAL
  • State: WY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The shipment was discovered leaking during sort operations. inner contents: 10 plastic bottles. Forklift accident. All remaining contents were placed in a salvage drum and held pending disposition from the shipper.
